snippet: Mitt Romney, Rick Santorum and Newt Gingrich all condemned a decision by the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit that California's ban on gay marriage is unconstitutional.
abstract: Mitt Romney, Rick Santorum and Newt Gingrich all condemned a decision by the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit that California's ban on gay marriage is unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Even as voters gathered in Minnesota, Colorado and Missouri to cast ballots on Tuesday, the Republican presidential candidates were reacting to a court case hundreds of miles away in California.
